name: All Is Lost (itch)
description:
Life has died out everywhere but a single small rock, spinning alone through space. Protect the precious living things from being smooshed by space rocks.

Escape or Space to start. P to pause.

Arrow keys to move and jump. Left click to fire. Right click to hover.

Fullscreen: F, Music: M, Restart: R

This game was made in way less than 48 hours, for Ludum Dare 31.

The project files are downloadable below. You'll need at least a Personal license for Construct 2 as well as the 'Polygon' plugin by Yann, available here.
